page.title: 04Sir Hector Monro/Creca
page.content: Conservative M.P. since 1964. He lives at Williamwood which he farms. He also has a flat in London for use when Parliament is sitting. In 1949 he married Elizabeth Anne Welch and they have two sons who are Army career officers. Sir Hector was educated at Canford ans Kings College, Cambridge. He served in the R.A.F. during the war and has still a keen interest in flying. His other interests are Rugby Football, Golf, and Vintage cars. A member of the Royal Company of Archers he was in the Queen's Bodyguard for Scotland. 1967-70 he was the Scottish Conservative Whip.
